title: Historic meeting to end politics of manoeuvrers forever: Hammad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 14 (APP): Minister for Energy Hammad Azhar on Monday said the historic public meeting being organized by the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf in the Federal Capital on March 27 would end the politics of manoeuverers forever.
It would not be an ordinary meeting, rather the biggest one in the countryâ€™s history and the plunderers of national wealth would no more be able to hoodwink the masses, he added in a post on his Twitter handle.
The minister said now the country would not be run on foreign agendas.
